<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 20; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lu12i.w; ori; lu32i.d; lu52i.d; jr</span></CodeLine>
